TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi TextBox extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class TextBox Inherits TextBoxBase Implements IAddChild
type TextBox = class inherit TextBoxBase interface IAddChild

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件可用于显示或编辑无格式文本。

span.span: Represents a control that can be used to display or edit unformatted text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件可以包含无格式的文本仅在其属性。A control can contain only unformatted text in its property. 下图显示的示例。The following graphic shows an example of a . ![文本框中的屏幕截图](~/add/media/ss-ctl-textbox.gif "文本框屏幕快照")![TextBox screen shot](~/add/media/ss-ctl-textbox.gif "TextBox screen shot") 文本框中的示例Example of a TextBox 是一个由多个封装组件组成的复合控件。 is a composite control that is composed of several encapsulated components. 因此，某些事件不归因于包含控件因为它们将由封装的子元素。Consequently, some events do not bubble up to the containing control because they are handled by encapsulated child elements. 因此，应用程序开发人员应侦听的事件 （以前缀"预览"表示） 的隧道版本。Because of this, application developers should listen for the tunneling version of an event (denoted by the prefix "Preview"). 支持仅限非格式化的文本。 supports unformatted text only. 对于需要对丰富内容的支持的应用程序，请参阅。For applications that require support for richer content, see . 对于需要接受密码或其他敏感输入的应用程序，请参阅。For applications that need to accept passwords or other sensitive input, see . 水平和垂直对齐文本内的通过和属性。Horizontally and vertically aligning text within a is done with the and properties. 对齐页的布局中通过和属性。Aligning the within the layout of the page is done with the and properties. 最佳办法隐藏周围的边框是设置的属性到`0`。The best way to hide the border around a is to set the property of the to `0`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 具有内置处理的浮升和事件。 has built-in handling for the bubbling and events. 因此，自定义事件处理程序，侦听或中的事件将不会调用。Consequently, custom event handlers that listen for or events from a will not be called. 如果需要响应这些事件，隧道侦听并事件相反，或注册处理程序替换参数 （此后一种选择是仅可通过代码）。If you need to respond to these events, listen for the tunneling and events instead, or register the handlers with the argument (this latter option is only available through code). 不要将标记处理除非有意要禁用的事件本机处理这些事件，并注意这产生显著影响控件的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。Do not mark the event handled unless you deliberately want to disable native handling of these events, and be aware that this has notable effects on the control's [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 滚动条上不可见默认情况下。Scrollbars are not visible on a by default. 若要使滚动条可见，请设置并属性设置为或。To make scrollbars visible, set the and properties to or . 通常用于每当检测到事件中的文本或而不是更改正如您所料。Usually the event should be used to detect whenever the text in a or changes rather then as you might expect. 请参阅[如何： 检测中的文本何时更改文本框](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-detect-when-text-in-a-textbox-has-changed.md)有关的示例。See [How to: Detect When Text in a TextBox Has Changed](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-detect-when-text-in-a-textbox-has-changed.md) for an example. ## 自定义文本框控件Customizing the TextBox Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用到多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 可以修改默认为控件提供唯一外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和状态的特定于，请参阅[TextBox 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/textbox-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [TextBox Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/textbox-styles-and-templates.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > Visual 属性设置才会影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并使用设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在中的"更改可视结构控制"部分中找到的视觉对象属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用文本属性可以设置文本框控件的初始文本内容。This example shows how to use the Text property to set the initial text contents of a TextBox control. > [!NOTE] > 虽然可以使用 Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 版本的示例\ 每个按钮的文本框内容的文本周围的标记，则没有必要因为文本框应用 ContentPropertyAttribute属性为 Text 属性。Although the Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) version of the example could use the \ tags around the text of each button's TextBox content, it is not necessary because the TextBox applies the ContentPropertyAttribute attribute to the Text property. ```xaml Initial text contents of the TextBox. ``` ```csharp tbSettingText.Text = "Initial text contents of the TextBox."; ``` ```vb tbSettingText.Text = "Initial text contents of the TextBox." ``` 有关其他示例，请参阅本文档的 4.0 版本： [TextBox 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms617604\(v=vs.100\).aspx)。For additional examples, see the 4.0 version of this document: [TextBox Class](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms617604\(v=vs.100\).aspx).

summary.span: 获取或设置插入符号的插入位置索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the insertion position index of the caret.

value.span: 插入符号的从零开始的插入位置索引。

span.span: The zero-based insertion position index of the caret.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性将返回当前的插入位置索引的插入符号 (请参阅有关"插入位置"等术语的信息)。Getting this property returns the current insertion position index of the caret (see for information on terminology like "insertion position"). 设置此属性将插入符号移动到指定的插入位置。Setting this property moves the caret to the specified insertion position. 字符或元素标记之间的插入位置。An insertion position is between either characters or element tags.

summary.span: 获取或设置向文本框中手动输入字符时如何确定字符的大小写格式。

span.span: Gets or sets how characters are cased when they are manually entered into the text box.

value.span: 值之一，指定如何确定手动输入字符的大小写格式。

span.span: One of the values that specifies how manually entered characters are cased.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不会影响以编程方式添加的字符。This property does not affect characters that are added programmatically. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来转换为大写在文本框中的所有手动输入的字符。The following example shows how to use the property to convert all manually entered characters to uppercase in a text box. [!code-xaml[TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip#CharacterCasingExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip/csharp/charactercasingexample.xaml#charactercasingexamplewholepage)] [!code-csharp[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#CharacterCasingCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/CharacterCasingExample.cs#charactercasingcodeexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#CharacterCasingCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/charactercasingexample.vb#charactercasingcodeexamplewholepage)]

summary.span: 获取文本框中的总行数。

span.span: Gets the total number of lines in the text box.

value.span: 文本框中的总行数；如果布局信息不可用，则为 –1。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果启用了文本换行，更改文本框的宽度可能会更改此值。If text wrapping is enabled, changing the width of the text box may change this value. 返回的值是在文本框中，而不考虑具体数量是当前可见的行的总数。The value returned is the total number of lines in the text box, regardless of how many are currently visible.

summary.span: 获取或设置可在文本框中手动输入的最大字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters that can be manually entered into the text box.

value.span: 可在文本框中手动输入的最大字符数。

span.span: The maximum number of characters that can be manually entered into the text box.

value.span: 默认值为 0，指示没有限制。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates no limit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于限制在控件中输入的值，例如邮政编码和电话号码的文本的长度。You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers. 此外可以使用此属性来限制输入时，数据将存储在数据库中，以便输入到控件的文本不超过数据库中的相应字段的最大长度的文本的长度。You can also use this property to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be stored in a database so that the text entered into the control does not exceed the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database. 此属性不会影响以编程方式添加的字符。This property does not affect characters that are added programmatically. 当此属性设置为 0 时，可以在控件中输入的文本的最大长度仅受到可用内存。When this property is set to 0, the maximum length of the text that can be entered in the control is limited only by available memory. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建与500 个字符。The following example shows how to create a with a of 500 characters. [!code-xaml[TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip#TextBoxExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip/csharp/textboxexample.xaml#textboxexamplewholepage)] [!code-csharp[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#TextBoxCodeExampleInline1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/TextBoxExample.cs#textboxcodeexampleinline1)] [!code-vb[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#TextBoxCodeExampleInline1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/textboxexample.vb#textboxcodeexampleinline1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性返回的当前值。Getting this property returns the current value of . 设置此属性会导致文本框中，若要调整大小如果可见行数超过指定的限制。Setting this property causes the text box to resize if the number of visible lines exceeds the limit specified by . 此属性仅适用于可见的行，并且不约束的实际行数。This property applies only to visible lines, and does not constrain the actual number of lines. 根据其配置中，文本框中可能包含其他不可见的行通过滚动可访问的。Depending on its configuration, a text box may contain additional non-visible lines that are accessible by scrolling. 如果属性显式设置上，则和属性值将被忽略。If the property is explicitly set on a , the and property values are ignored. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建与值为 5。The following example shows how to create a with a value of 5. summary.span: 获取或设置文本框中当前选择的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of the current selection in the text box.

value.span: 文本框中当前选定的文本。

span.span: The currently selected text in the text box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性返回当前所选文本的字符串副本。Getting this property returns a string copy of the currently selected text. 设置此属性将替换为指定字符的当前所选内容。Setting this property replaces the current selection with the specified string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionLength { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectionLength : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文本框中当前选择的字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of characters in the current selection in the text box.

value.span: 文本框中当前选择的字符数。

span.span: The number of characters in the current selection in the text box.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性返回当前选定内容中的字符数。Getting this property returns the number of characters in the current selection. 将此属性设置调整为指定的值，修复所选内容的起始位置保持当前所选内容的长度。Setting this property adjusts the length of the current selection to the specified value, keeping the beginning of the selection fixed. 一般情况下，指定所选内容长度时使选择的结束于某个无效的位置 （如之间回车和换行字符，或标记内），选择长度自动调整，使生成所选内容并以有效的位置结束。In general, when the specified selection length causes the selection to end in an invalid position (for example, between a carriage return and a new-line character, or inside a tag), the selection length automatically adjusts so that the resulting selection starts and ends in valid positions.

span.span: is set to a negative value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionStart { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectionStart : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当前选择的起始位置的字符索引。

span.span: Gets or sets a character index for the beginning of the current selection.

value.span: 当前选择的起始位置的字符索引。

span.span: The character index for the beginning of the current selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在其中指定所选内容长度会导致选择结束回车和换行字符之间的情况下，选择长度为自动增加 1，以便获得的选择跨越整个行结束标记。In cases where the specified selection length would cause the selection to end between a carriage return and a new-line character, the selection length is automatically increased by 1 so that the resulting selection spans the entire end-of-line marker.

span.span: is set to a negative value.

summary.span: 获取要应用到文本框的文本修饰。

span.span: Gets the text decorations to apply to the text box.

value.span: 一个 集合，它包含应用于文本框的文本修饰。

span.span: A collection that contains text decorations to apply to the text box.

value.span: 默认值为 （不应用任何文本修饰）。

span.span: The default is (no text decorations applied).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象是可以添加到文本的视觉装饰。A object is a visual ornamentation you can add to text. 有四种类型的文本修饰： 下划线、 基线、 删除线和上划线。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 有关文本修饰的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建文本修饰](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md)。For more information about text decorations, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性，使用作为示例元素。The following example shows how to set the attribute, using as the example element. [!code-xaml[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDecXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_inline_textdecxaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![屏幕快照： 具有默认删除线效果的文本](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "屏幕快照： 具有默认删除线效果的文本")![Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect") 下图显示如何， ，和修饰的呈现效果，分别。The following figures show how the , , and decorations render, respectively. ![屏幕快照： 上划线 TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "屏幕快照： 上划线 TextDecorator")![Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator") ![屏幕快照： 默认基线效果的文本](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "屏幕快照： 的默认基线效果的文本")![Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text") ![屏幕快照： 具有默认下划线效果的文本](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "屏幕快照： 具有默认下划线效果的文本")![Screenshot: Text with default underline effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "Screenshot: Text with default underline effect") 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_inline_textdec)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_inline_textdec)]

summary.span: 获取文本框的文本内容的当前有效版式变体。

span.span: Gets the currently effective typography variations for the text contents of the text box.

value.span: 一个 对象，它指定当前有效的版式变体。

span.span: A object that specifies the currently effective typography variations.

value.span: 有关默认版式值的列表，请参见 。

span.span: For a list of default typography values, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是仅适用于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]字体。The property is applicable only to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts. 版式变体不起上不支持变体的字体。A typography variant has no effect on fonts that do not support the variant. 有关此主题的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 中的版式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md)。For more information about this topic, see [Typography in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性，使用作为示例元素。The following example shows how to set the attribute, using as the example element. [!code-xaml[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_TypogXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textelement_typogxaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![屏幕截图： 改变版式的文本](~/add/media/textelement-typog.png "屏幕截图： 改变版式的文本")![Screenshot: Text with altered typography](~/add/media/textelement-typog.png "Screenshot: Text with altered typography") 与此相反，下图显示了一个具有默认版式属性的类似示例的呈现效果。In contrast, the following figure shows how a similar example with default typographic properties renders. ![屏幕截图： 改变版式的文本](~/add/media/textelement-typog-default.png "屏幕截图： 改变版式的文本")![Screenshot: Text with altered typography](~/add/media/textelement-typog-default.png "Screenshot: Text with altered typography") 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Typog](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textelement_typog)] [!code-vb[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Typog](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textelement_typog)]
